categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Alois Akrone was a human male who served as a pilot in the Galactic Empire before the Galactic Civil War. A student at the Imperial Academy, he was friends with Sax Hastur and Poul Ashanto on Prefsbelt. He had a brother, Heiwei Akrone, who served in the Imperial Navy as part of Banshee Squadron shortly before the Galactic Civil War. Shortly after the Battle of Yavin, Akrone was remembered by the pilots in the bar "Zero Angle", where his hologram was on the wall of the honor of the dead pilots.
